name: Aurelia on GitHub Sponsored Organizations
description: Today, we're pleased to share that Aurelia was selected by GitHub to be one of the first open source organizations to participate in their new GitHub Sponsored Organizations program!
content:
Today, we're pleased to share that Aurelia was selected by GitHub to be one of the first open source organizations to participate in their new GitHub Sponsored Organizations program!

Aurelia is more than a front-end framework. It's a platform and ecosystem, built on the open web, enabling the creation of ambitious user interfaces. Sustaining Aurelia wouldn't be possible at all without [the support of our sponsors](https://github.com/aurelia/framework/blob/master/BACKERS.md). Now, thanks to GitHub, we have a new way for you to contribute. Please [visit our new Aurelia sponsor page](https://github.com/sponsors/aurelia) on GitHub to learn more about how you can help.

If you're wondering what kinds of things your sponsorship has enabled in recent months, here are a few related posts:

* [Full-time Development on Aurelia](https://aurelia.io/blog/2019/10/17/aurelia-goes-full-time/)
* [Aurelia 2](https://aurelia.io/blog/2019/10/31/aurelia-vnext-2019-fall-update/)
* Continued fixes and enhancements to Aurelia 1, [month](https://aurelia.io/blog/2019/09/10/aurelia-release-notes-september-2019/) over [month](https://aurelia.io/blog/2019/06/02/aurelia-release-notes-june-2019/) over [month](https://aurelia.io/blog/2019/05/05/aurelia-release-notes-may-2019/) over [month](https://aurelia.io/blog/2019/04/02/aurelia-release-notes-april-2019)...
